steps.title: Intention
steps.description: Make the intention to perform sunrise prayer.

steps.title: Takbiratul Ihram
steps.description: Say 'Allahu Akbar' to begin the prayer.

steps.title: Opening Supplication
steps.description: Recite the opening supplication (Du'a Al-Istiftah).

steps.title: Surah Al-Fatiha
steps.description: Recite Surah Al-Fatiha.

steps.title: Recite a Surah
steps.description: Recite another Surah (typically Surah Al-Ikhlas).

steps.title: Takbir before Ruku'
steps.description: Say 'Allahu Akbar' before going into Ruku' (bowing).

steps.title: Ruku'
steps.description: Go into Ruku' (bowing).

steps.title: Rise from Ruku'
steps.description: Rise from Ruku' saying 'Sami' Allahu liman hamidah' and then 'Rabbana laka al-hamd'.

steps.title: Takbir before Sujud
steps.description: Say 'Allahu Akbar' before going into Sujud (prostration).

steps.title: First Sujud
steps.description: Go into Sujud (prostration).

steps.title: Takbir before Sitting
steps.description: Say 'Allahu Akbar' before sitting up from Sujud.

steps.title: Jalsa
steps.description: Sit briefly after the first Sujud.

steps.title: Takbir before Second Sujud
steps.description: Say 'Allahu Akbar' before going into the second Sujud.

steps.title: Second Sujud
steps.description: Go into the second Sujud (prostration).

steps.title: Stand for Second Raka'a
steps.description: Stand up for the second Raka'a saying 'Allahu Akbar'.

steps.title: Surah Al-Fatiha (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Recite Surah Al-Fatiha.

steps.title: Recite a Surah (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Recite another Surah (typically Surah Al-Ikhlas).

steps.title: Takbir before Ruku' (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Say 'Allahu Akbar' before going into Ruku' (bowing).

steps.title: Ruku' (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Go into Ruku' (bowing).

steps.title: Rise from Ruku' (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Rise from Ruku' saying 'Sami' Allahu liman hamidah' and then 'Rabbana laka al-hamd'.

steps.title: Takbir before Sujud (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Say 'Allahu Akbar' before going into Sujud (prostration).

steps.title: First Sujud (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Go into Sujud (prostration).

steps.title: Takbir before Sitting (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Say 'Allahu Akbar' before sitting up from Sujud.

steps.title: Jalsa (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Sit briefly after the first Sujud.

steps.title: Takbir before Second Sujud (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Say 'Allahu Akbar' before going into the second Sujud.

steps.title: Second Sujud (Second Raka'a)
steps.description: Go into the second Sujud (prostration).

steps.title: Tashahhud
steps.description: After the second Sujud of the second Raka'a, sit for Tashahhud.

steps.title: Recite Tashahhud
steps.description: Recite the Tashahhud.

steps.title: Salat Ibrahimiyya
steps.description: Recite Salat Ibrahimiyya.

steps.title: End Prayer - Right
steps.description: End the prayer by turning your head to the right and saying 'Assalamu Alaikum wa Rahmatullah'.

steps.title: End Prayer - Left
steps.description: Turn your head to the left and repeat 'Assalamu Alaikum wa Rahmatullah'.
